ability_info.name: sleep attack
ability_info.description: Puts an enemy to sleep for 3 turns.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Sleep with a 100% base chance for three turns.

ability_info.name: silence attack
ability_info.description: Silences an enemy for 3 turns.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Silence with a 100% base chance for three turns.

ability_info.name: dark attack
ability_info.description: Inflicts darkness on an enemy for 3 turns.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Darkness with a 100% base chance for three turns.

ability_info.name: sleep buster
ability_info.description: Almost always puts an enemy to sleep for 1 turn.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and always inflicts Sleep for one turn unless it is immune.

ability_info.name: silence buster
ability_info.description: Almost always silences an enemy for 1 turn.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and always inflicts Silence for one turn unless it is immune.

ability_info.name: dark buster
ability_info.description: Almost always inflicts darkness on an enemy for 1 turn.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and always inflicts Darkness for one turn unless it is immune.

ability_info.name: zombie attack
ability_info.description: Inflicts an enemy with zombie status.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Zombie with a 100% base chance.

ability_info.name: triple foul
ability_info.description: Sleep, silence, and darkness on an enemy for 3 turns.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Darkness, Silence, and Sleep with a 100% base chance each for three turns.

ability_info.name: delay attack
ability_info.description: Delays action of an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and causes weak Delay.

ability_info.name: delay buster
ability_info.description: Greatly delays action of an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and causes strong Delay.

ability_info.name: extract power
ability_info.description: Makes one enemy drop Power Spheres.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target. Causes an enemy to drop Power Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

ability_info.name: extract mana
ability_info.description: Makes one enemy drop Mana Spheres.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target. Causes an enemy to drop Mana Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

ability_info.name: extract speed
ability_info.description: Makes one enemy drop Speed Spheres.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target. Causes an enemy to drop Speed Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

ability_info.name: extract ability
ability_info.description: Makes one enemy drop Ability Spheres.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target. Causes an enemy to drop Ability Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

ability_info.name: power break
ability_info.description: Lowers an enemy's Strength.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Power Break on it with a 100% base chance.

ability_info.name: magic break
ability_info.description: Lowers an enemy's Magic.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Magic Break on it with a 100% base chance.

ability_info.name: armor break
ability_info.description: Lowers an enemy's Defense and nullifies armored.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Armor Break on it with a 100% base chance.

ability_info.name: mental break
ability_info.description: Lowers an enemy's Magic Defense.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Mental Break on it with a 100% base chance.

ability_info.name: full break
ability_info.description: Inflicts Power, Magic, Armor, and Mental Break.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target and inflicts Power Break, Magic Break, Armor Break, and Mental Break on it with a 100% base chance each.

ability_info.name: mug
ability_info.description: Steals items and damages one enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one enemy and attempts to Steal from it. The chance of success is halved with each successful steal.

ability_info.name: nab gil
ability_info.description: Attack and steal gil at the same time.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one enemy and steals Gil from it. The chance of success is halved with each successful steal.

ability_info.name: quick hit
ability_info.description: Strike quickly with reduced recovery time.
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one target. Is faster than a normal Attack.

ability_info.name: steal
ability_info.description: Steal items from enemy.
ability_info.effect: Attempts to Steal an item from an enemy. The chance of success is halved with each successful steal.

ability_info.name: use
ability_info.description: Use special items.
ability_info.effect: Allows you to use certain items.

ability_info.name: flee
ability_info.description: Aid party's escape from battle.
ability_info.effect: Causes entire party to immediately Escape from battle without fail.

ability_info.name: pray
ability_info.description: Restores some HP to all allies.
ability_info.effect: Restores a very small amount of HP of party. Deals damage to Zombies.

ability_info.name: cheer
ability_info.description: Raises party's Strength and Defense.
ability_info.effect: Raises the party's Strength by 1 and reduces their buff-factor, a factor used in the defensive formula, for strength-based attacks by 1/15 for the duration of the battle (removed if KO'd). Can be stacked up to five times (stacks additively). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: aim
ability_info.description: Raises party's Accuracy.
ability_info.effect: Adds 10% to the party's final hit rate for the duration of the battle (removed if KO'd). Can be stacked up to five times and also stacks with the Luck Ability (stacks additively in all cases). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: focus
ability_info.description: Raises party's Magic and Magic Defense.
ability_info.effect: Raises the party's Magic by 1 and reduces their buff-factor, a factor used in the defensive formula, for magic-based attacks by 1/15 for the duration of the battle (removed if KO'd). Can be stacked up to five times (stacks additively). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: reflex
ability_info.description: Raises party's Evasion.
ability_info.effect: Adds 10% to the party's final evasion rate for the duration of the battle (removed if KO'd). Can be stacked up to five times (stacks additively). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: luck
ability_info.description: Raises party's Luck.
ability_info.effect: Adds 1% to the party's final hit rate and critical hit rate for the duration of the battle (removed if KO'd). Can be stacked up to five times and also stacks with the Aim Ability (stacks additively in all cases). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: jinx
ability_info.description: Lowers all enemies' Luck.
ability_info.effect: Subtracts 1% from all enemy's final evasion rate and critical hit defense rate for the duration of the battle. Can be stacked up to five times (stacks additively).

ability_info.name: lancet
ability_info.description: Absorb HP & MP from an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Absorbs a small amount of HP and MP from one enemy and gives it to the user (effect is reversed if the enemy is a Zombie). If used by Kimahri, he will also learn an enemy's Ronso Rage, and if he does so, gets a full Overdrive Gauge.

ability_info.name: guard
ability_info.description: Take damage for an ally.
ability_info.effect: Causes the user to intercept all single-target physical attacks directed towards the party until the user's next turn.

ability_info.name: sentinel
ability_info.description: Guard allies while in defensive stance.
ability_info.effect: Causes the user to enter Defend status and intercept all single-target physical attacks directed towards the party until the user's next turn.

ability_info.name: spare change
ability_info.description: Attack by throwing gil.
ability_info.effect: Allows you to choose an amount of Gil to throw at an enemy. Every 10 Gil thrown will increase the damage dealt by 1 point.

ability_info.name: threaten
ability_info.description: Immobilize an enemy with fear.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Threaten status on one enemy, preventing it from acting until the user's next turn. CTB altering actions like Haste, Slow, or Delay will fail on the user until their turn.

ability_info.name: provoke
ability_info.description: Draw an enemy's attacks towards you.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Provoke status on one enemy, forcing it to use a specific move to attack the user.

ability_info.name: entrust
ability_info.description: Contribute your Overdrive charge to an ally's gauge.
ability_info.effect: Transfers user's entire Overdrive gauge to another character.

ability_info.name: copycat
ability_info.description: Mimic an ally's previous action.
ability_info.effect: Causes the character to mimic the previous action of another character, if it can be mimicked.

ability_info.name: pilfer gil
ability_info.description: Steal gil from an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Attempts to Steal Gil from an enemy. The chance of success is halved with each successful steal.

ability_info.name: quick pockets
ability_info.description: Swiftly use items.
ability_info.effect: Use an item. Is faster than the Item command.

ability_info.name: doublecast
ability_info.description: Cast two black magic spells in a row.
ability_info.effect: Allows the user to cast two Blk Magic spells during the same turn.

ability_info.name: bribe
ability_info.description: Pay enemies gil to go away.
ability_info.effect: Attempts to pay an enemy to get it to leave the battle. Bribed enemies are considered defeated, and will give Items based upon their Bribe information and the amount of money given. The required amount is a multiple of the enemy's HP. HPx10 = 25% success rate, HPx15 = 50%, HPx20 = 75%, HPx25 = 100%. If the attempt is unsuccessful, the spent amount is still stored for the enemy type, and every additional attempt will add to that total until the bribe succeeds.

ability_info.name: cure
ability_info.description: Restores some HP.
ability_info.effect: Restores a small amount of HP to one target. Damages Zombies.

ability_info.name: cura
ability_info.description: Restores a lot of HP.
ability_info.effect: Restores a moderate amount of HP to one target. Damages Zombies.

ability_info.name: curaga
ability_info.description: Restores a massive amount of HP.
ability_info.effect: Restores a large amount of HP to one target. Damages Zombies.

ability_info.name: scan
ability_info.description: View an enemy's data.
ability_info.effect: Shows detailed information about a target, including HP, elemental weaknesses, current statuses, and a detailed description. After scanning, information for the Scanned enemy will be shown as if you had a Sensor Weapon equipped.

ability_info.name: nulblaze
ability_info.description: Nullifies one fire attack on party.
ability_info.effect: Grants NulBlaze to party.

ability_info.name: nulshock
ability_info.description: Nullifies one lightning attack on party.
ability_info.effect: Grants NulShock to party.

ability_info.name: nultide
ability_info.description: Nullifies one water attack on party.
ability_info.effect: Grants NulTide to party.

ability_info.name: nulfrost
ability_info.description: Nullifies one ice attack on party.
ability_info.effect: Grants NulFrost to party.

ability_info.name: esuna
ability_info.description: Cures a character's status ailments.
ability_info.effect: Cures all status ailments of one target, except KO, Doom, Curse, and the Breaks.

ability_info.name: life
ability_info.description: Revives a KO'd character.
ability_info.effect: Revives a KO'd character with half of their max HP. Can kill Zombies. Deals 50% of a Zombie's max HP as damage if it is immune to Life (maximum damage = damage limit).

ability_info.name: full-life
ability_info.description: Revives a KO'd character and fully restores HP.
ability_info.effect: Revives a KO'd character with half of their max HP. Can kill Zombies. Deals 100% of a Zombie's max HP as damage if it is immune to Life (maximum damage = damage limit).

ability_info.name: haste
ability_info.description: Speeds up one character.
ability_info.effect: Grants Haste status to one target.

ability_info.name: hastega
ability_info.description: Speeds up party.
ability_info.effect: Grants Haste status to party.

ability_info.name: slow
ability_info.description: Slows an enemy down.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Slow status on one target.

ability_info.name: slowga
ability_info.description: Slows all enemies down.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Slow status on target party.

ability_info.name: shell
ability_info.description: Raises a character's Magic Defense.
ability_info.effect: Grants Shell status to one target.

ability_info.name: protect
ability_info.description: Raises a character's Defense.
ability_info.effect: Grants Protect status to one target.

ability_info.name: reflect
ability_info.description: Target reflects spells towards enemy.
ability_info.effect: Grants Reflect status to one target.

ability_info.name: dispel
ability_info.description: Negates all spell effects on an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Removes all positive status effects except Auto-Life from one target. Also removes the Breaks and Curse.

ability_info.name: regen
ability_info.description: Target gradually recovers HP for a time.
ability_info.effect: Grants Regen status to one target.

ability_info.name: holy
ability_info.description: Deals holy damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals heavy holy elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: auto-life
ability_info.description: Target is automatically revived once when KO'd.
ability_info.effect: Grants Auto-Life status to one target.

ability_info.name: auto-life
ability_info.effect: Revives a KO'd character with a quarter of their max HP.

damage_calc.condition: When character with auto-life status is KO'd.

ability_info.name: fire
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals light fire-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: thunder
ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals light lightning-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: water
ability_info.description: Deals water damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals light water-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: blizzard
ability_info.description: Deals ice damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals light ice-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: fira
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals moderate fire-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: thundara
ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals moderate lightning-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: watera
ability_info.description: Deals water damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals moderate water-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: blizzara
ability_info.description: Deals ice damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals moderate ice-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: firaga
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals heavy fire-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: thundaga
ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals heavy lightning-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: waterga
ability_info.description: Deals water damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals heavy water-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: blizzaga
ability_info.description: Deals ice damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals heavy ice-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: bio
ability_info.description: Poisons an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Poison on one target. Always succeeds, unless the target is immune.

ability_info.name: demi
ability_info.description: Reduces HP of all enemies by 1/4.
ability_info.effect: Reduces target party's HP to 75% of their current HP.

ability_info.name: death
ability_info.description: Can instantly KO an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Instant KO on one enemy with 100% base accuracy. Fails against Zombies.

ability_info.name: drain
ability_info.description: Absorb HP from an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Absorbs HP from one target and heals the caster's HP for the amount of damage dealt. Effect is reversed against Zombies.

ability_info.name: osmose
ability_info.description: Absorb MP from an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Absorbs MP from one target and heals the caster's MP for the amount of damage dealt. Effect is reversed against Zombies.

ability_info.name: flare
ability_info.description: Deals non-elemental damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals heavy non-elemental magic damage to one target.

ability_info.name: ultima
ability_info.description: Deals non-elemental damage to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals heavy non-elemental magic damage to target party.

ability_info.name: sonic wings
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy and delays its turn.
ability_info.effect: Deals unblockable ranged physical damage and weak Delay to one enemy.

ability_info.name: meteor strike
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals unblockable ranged special damage to one enemy.

ability_info.name: aerospark
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy and negates all spell effects.
ability_info.effect: Deals unblockable ranged physical damage to one enemy and removes all positive status effects from it.

ability_info.name: heavenly strike
ability_info.description: Deals unblockable ranged physical damage to one enemy and inflicts Threaten.
ability_info.effect: Damages an enemy and delays its movement.

ability_info.name: impulse
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals unblockable ranged physical damage to all enemies.

ability_info.name: pain
ability_info.description: Deals damage and Death to an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals magical damage to one enemy and always inflicts Death on it unless it is immune.

ability_info.name: daigoro
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one enemy.

ability_info.name: kozuka
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one enemy.

ability_info.name: wakizashi
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one enemy.

ability_info.name: wakizashi
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to all enemies.

ability_info.name: zanmato
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Death on all enemies, ignoring immunities.

ability_info.name: camisade
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one enemy.

ability_info.name: razzia
ability_info.effect: Deals physical damage to one enemy.

ability_info.name: nulall
ability_info.effect: Grants NulBlaze, NulShock, NulTide, and NulFrost to party.

ability_info.name: passado
ability_info.effect: Deals 15 hits of physical damage to one enemy.

ability_info.name: taking a break...
ability_info.effect: The user does nothing, essentially skipping their turn.

ability_info.name: attack
ability_info.description: Attack an enemy with equipped weapon.
ability_info.effect: Attacks one target with a physical attack.

ability_info.name: attack
ability_info.description: Attack an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Attacks one target with a physical attack.

ability_info.name: summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Valefor
ability_info.effect: Summons Valefor to the field.

ability_info.name: summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Ifrit
ability_info.effect: Summons Ifrit to the field.

ability_info.name: summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Ixion
ability_info.effect: Summons Ixion to the field.

ability_info.name: summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Shiva
ability_info.effect: Summons Shiva to the field.

ability_info.name: summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Bahamut
ability_info.effect: Summons Bahamut to the field.

ability_info.name: summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Anima
ability_info.effect: Summons Anima to the field.

ability_info.name: summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Yojimbo
ability_info.effect: Summons Yojimbo to the field.

ability_info.name: summon
ability_info.description: Summon the Magus Sisters
ability_info.effect: Summons the Magus Sisters to the field.

ability_info.name: defend
ability_info.description: Reduces damage from physical attacks.
ability_info.effect: Halves all physical damage taken by the user until their next turn.

ability_info.name: switch
ability_info.description: Switch to $character.
ability_info.effect: Switch the user out with another available character. Doesn't cost a turn.

ability_info.name: weapon
ability_info.description: Change equipped weapon.
ability_info.effect: Changes the user's Weapon.

ability_info.name: armor
ability_info.description: Change equipped armor.
ability_info.effect: Changes the user's Armor.

ability_info.name: escape
ability_info.description: Run away from battle.
ability_info.effect: The user attempts to escape from battle. Has a 75% success rate. If successful, only the user of the ability is removed from battle.

ability_info.name: shield
ability_info.description: Take less damage, but Overdrive gauge wont charge.
ability_info.effect: Causes the Aeon to take 75% less damage but gain no Overdrive gauge until its next turn.

ability_info.name: boost
ability_info.description: Take more damage, but charge Overdrive gauge faster.
ability_info.effect: Causes the Aeon to take 50% more damage but charge its Overdrive gauge 50% faster until its next turn.

ability_info.name: dismiss
ability_info.description: Send aeon away.
ability_info.effect: Remove all your Aeons from the field and return to your active party. In the case of the Magus Sisters, any KO'd Sister will be revived with 1 HP.
